attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I trusted him as the chancellor,now he is losing control and trying to do everything now he is in no10,he lacks credibility and won't get my vote at next election.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
